name: Health Flask
desc: A potion that fills you with energy and staunches minor wounds.

abilities.name: Drink
abilities.effect: Create an [_Opening_]. Clear all _Stun_, then restore 5 _Health_.

name: Caltrops
desc: A satchel full of small triangle spikes of metal.
effect: A small bag of metallic caltrops that can be used to deter enemies from entering a space. These are typically lost after use, but characters that have a way to quickly collect them may be able to reuse them. While _Worn_, this may be treated as an effectively unlimited source for _Trinket_ _Metal_ items. If used as a _Missile_, use _Scatter_ at no cost in the target's _Arena_.

abilities.name: Scatter
abilities.effect: You scatter metallic caltrops in the Target, creating dangerous terrain. Creatures in the Target must spend 1 extra _Movement_ whenever they spend _Movement_ and _Negate_ _Reflex_ with _Disadavantage. A creature may take 2 [_Stab_] Damage to ignore this effect for a single Move or _Negate_.

name: Thunderstone
desc: A fragile crystal that, when shattered, emits a vicious blast of light and sound.
effect: This stone, when hit with sufficient force, detonates in a concussive blast of light and sound that can destroy objects or act as a signal.

abilities.name: Fling
abilities.effect:
All creatures in an _Engagement_ within Range must immediately _Negate_ [5 _Grit_].
* On a success, they are _Grazed_.
* On a failure, they are _Hit_.

name: Smith's Tools
effect: A set of simple metal-working tools that can be used to repair equipment while traveling, or handle simple forging if you have access to a forge. It includes a hammer, tongs, and various files.

name: Bedroll
effect: A simple bedroll and bedding material that keeps you off the ground and ensures a good nights sleep.

name: Tent
effect: A tent big enough for two that keeps you out of the weather to ensure a good nights sleep.

name: Rope
effect: 50' of rope. There is absolutely no use for rope on adventures, it has yet to be found.

name: Rations
effect: Dried food such as jerky and hardtack that, while hardly a feast, is enough to keep you moving. This counts as _Poor_ quality food.

name: Iron Scrap
effect: Scrap metal, typically used for extensive equipment repair. While _Worn_, this may be treated as an effectively unlimited source for _Load_ 0 _Metal_ items.

name: Waterskin
effect: A water-tight pouch containing a day's worth of water.
